products.title: ARC InstaTemp Digital Infrared Thermometer
products.description: This is ideal for mothers with weaning children
products.How to use: Hold the ARC InstaTemp Thermometer an inch away from the forehead and press the button. Release the button once the LED display is illuminated and a temperature reading is displayed on the screen. The temperature reading is displayed for 4 seconds
products.Precautions: Refer to the user manual inside on how it operates.

products.title: Avent Baby Food Steamer+Blender+Thermal Bag
products.description: This is ideal for mothers with weaning children and those who are constantly in the move, It contains a food steamer which is ideal for warming the baby's food while on the move. It also has a blender which i generally for blending what may be required and it further has a thermal bag which is handy in keeping the baby's food warm..
